User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Product pages
Allow: /products/
Allow: /categories/
Allow: /vendors/
Allow: /search

# Static assets
Allow: /images/
Allow: /icons/
Allow: /static/

# API endpoints should not be crawled
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/

# Private user areas
Disallow: /profile/
Disallow: /checkout/
Disallow: /cart/

# Bangladesh specific pages allowed
Allow: /bn/
Allow: /bangla/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://getit.com.bd/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for Bangladesh market optimization
Crawl-delay: 1
